services.development.title: PERSONAL BRAND LANDING PAGE
services.development.description: Want to promote your personal brand online? Let's create a professional landing page.
services.development.points1: Customized project tailored to personal brand requirements
services.development.points2: 6 months of support after service completion
services.development.points3: PDF with steps to edit the site yourself
services.coaching.title: OPEN-SOURCE APP DEPLOYMENT
services.coaching.description: Have a ready open-source application and want to deploy it on a server? I'll handle it.
services.coaching.points2: 30 days of technical support after deployment
services.coaching.price: 2000 PLN net per app + 30 days support

services.audits.description: Do you have doubts about current solutions?
services.audits.points1: We will develop an action plan
projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.subtitle: See what you can gain from our collaboration
projects.piotrchojankowski: Portfolio website for an expert in the field of insurance, financial and investment advice.
projects.eccdna: Team's page devoted to research on eccDNA-based quantitative markers.
projects.hiszpanbet: HiszpanBet is a dynamic company with over 30 years of experience in the market, specializing in the production of top-quality concrete fences, offering comprehensive transportation and installation services.
projects.blog.higherEducation: What does higher education do to a person?
projects.mirecc: Database for identifying quantitative tumor markers
projects.nimbleninja: Portfolio website and blog for a marketing agency. Nimble Ninja helps brands stand out from the competition by using impressive advertising videos.
projects.eduspotpro: Website for a multisensory language school from Poznań. Eduspot Progress offers innovative language learning through play – English and Spanish for children, youth, and adults.
projects.nkowalczyk: Portfolio website for Natalia Kowalczyk – a Master of Pedagogy and Coaching, professionally working as an HR Business Partner.
projects.mydr: MyDr is a service combining a doctor search engine with full access to your medical data. Make an appointment, receive an e-prescription or e-sick leave without leaving your home.
pricing.title: Investment in Your Peace of Mind and Security
pricing.guarantee: Satisfaction Guarantee: 30 days of technical support and startup warranty for every implementation
pricing.interested_message: Hello, I am interested in the package: {package}.
pricing.packages.authority.title: Digital Authority (Professional Website)
pricing.packages.authority.subtitle: For experts building a personal brand.
pricing.packages.authority.feature1: 30 days of technical care and security guarantee: I will take the risk of failure off you after implementation.
pricing.packages.authority.feature2: Individual design building trust: Website design based on psychological mechanisms that convert visitors into clients.
pricing.packages.authority.feature3: SEO optimization for authority in Google: Technical preparation of the site so that your name works for you in the search engine.
pricing.packages.independence.title: Operational Independence
pricing.packages.independence.subtitle: Stop renting tools. Start owning them.
pricing.packages.independence.feature1: Own Newsletter system (Listmonk) – no fees for subscribers
pricing.packages.independence.feature2: Private company cloud (Nextcloud) – Your data on your server
pricing.packages.commerce.title: Sovereign Commerce
pricing.packages.commerce.subtitle: Sell digital and physical products without commission.
